Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory546.jpg'}
{3: "An endless stream of notifications is flooding the screen of Celica's terminal in rapid succession."}
{3: 'But she has no time to process any of them.'}
{3: 'The corridor outside the conference room is bustling with people. Celica weaves through the crowd and stops before an automatic door.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDoorOpen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory545.jpg'}
{3: 'The sliding doors part silently. She takes a deep breath before stepping forward.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiDoorOpen02.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "What's the status of the comms array? Have we established contact with Gray Raven?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Celica offers a quick salute before opening a message on her terminal. Having cross-referenced the data in the summary report, she delivers a less-than-optimistic answer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "We've locked onto the source of the high-energy signal, and the observation satellites have confirmed the exact coordinates of Aerospace City.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'However... severe electromagnetic interference, presumably from the charging reactor, continues to affect the city and its surrounding areas.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Celica', 3: "We're having difficulty pinpointing the beacon of 【kuroname】, making communication impossible for now. However, we've received a brief report from them, which has been encrypted and forwarded to everyone's terminals.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Aerospace City... mechanoids... resistance...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Reduced to blood-red words, the brief mission report paints a picture of a snow-swept city at a distant outpost.'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'How far is the nearest Task Force squad from there?', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Celica', 3: "According to reports from New Sophiasburgh, there are minefields on the outskirts of Aerospace City, and at least one-third of the city's defense facilities remain operational.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The meeting room falls into silence.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory256.png'}
{3: 'One hour earlier.'}
{3: 'Unknown signal investigation in Aerospace City. Mission duration: 45:10:58.'}
{3: 'The sexagesimal digits cycle endlessly, the numbers on the leftmost side of the screen steadily climbing.'}
{3: "Forty hours have passed since Gray Raven's last mission report."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Surface control has confirmed with the Forest Guard that Gray Raven split up with them in the forest surrounding Aerospace City.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "According to Rosetta's recollection, it should be around... this area.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He traces a circle the size of a coaster on the ancient map shared by Kowloong, then gently taps its center.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'According to the field report, there appears to be no significant threat aside from the minefields and minor Hetero-Creature activities.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Long', 3: 'So... can we deploy a Task Force squad to investigate?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's too risky. Aerospace City's defense systems are in the vicinity, and... we might provoke neighboring factions.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Have we gotten anything from analyzing those abnormal high-powered radio waves directed at Babylonia?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Long', 3: 'Not yet. It appears to be some form of encrypted message, but...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Just as Long is about to open another report, the display with the mission timer is suddenly flooded with crimson.'}
{3: "The white dot marking Gray Raven's position vanishes from the digital map. Not far away, ominous ripples begin to spread from a dark red mass between the contour lines."}
{2: 'System Alert', 3: 'Warning! Powerful reaction detected on ground level. Warning! Powerful reaction detected on ground level...'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This intensity... Is it a reactor meltdown?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Aerospace City is a metropolis built upon nuclear power, and its reactor is the only thing that can cause an anomaly of this magnitude within the mission area.'}
{3: "Asimov's fingers dart across the screen, swiftly pinpointing the source of the reaction on the map."}
{3: 'No one could have anticipated that Aerospace City would reveal its hidden coordinates in such a catastrophic way.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Long', 3: "That's not right. The remote sensing satellites haven't detected any explosion, and the radiation levels in the area haven't changed...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The Kowloong researcher quickly shifts his focus to the data, dismissing what would have been the most intuitive conclusion.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "A Hetero-Creature outbreak? But viral activities couldn't have generated such massive energy instantaneously.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Long', 3: 'Increasing ionization reactions... Obstructive interference...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'That forest seems to be a bottomless void, ready to devour everything in its path.'}
{3: 'A complex mix of emotions crosses his face as he turns to Asimov, carefully enunciating each word of his question.'}
{2: 'Long', 3: 'Asimov, have you heard of a top-secret research project that Kowloong conducted in Aerospace City during the Golden Age?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Long', 3: "That project's codename was...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Long', 3: '"The bridge to heaven".', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory427.jpg'}
{1: 'Parliament Hall', 2: 'One hour and thirty minutes later'}
{3: "The dome casts an ethereal blue light across the chamber. This hall, which has determined humanity's fate countless times, resembles more of a gladiatorial arena—even down to its architecture."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I trust everyone has reviewed the mission briefing in the materials I sent in advance.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Tsiolkovsky Aerospace City—a place I'm sure everyone present is quite familiar with.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'According to all available intelligence, Aerospace City has been occupied by mechanoids, and...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Ninety-seven minutes ago, we detected high-energy readings south of New Murmansk on the Kola Peninsula, and the energy signatures were consistent with a reactor charging for orbital operations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'These energy readings originate from a top-secret aerospace project that should have been abandoned after the virus outbreak—the magnetic accelerator track "Bifrost".', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A brief wave of murmurs ripples through the hall before quickly being hushed into silence.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'In other words, "Bifrost" is charging up and preparing for activation.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Councilor A', 3: '"Bifrost"? That\'s impossible...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Councilor B', 3: 'Does it work on the same principle as a coilgun?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Although these council members may have non-military backgrounds, the battles Babylonia has faced thus far have made them acutely aware of potential threats.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: "As you can see, this is an attempt to enter Earth's orbit by an unknown force from the surface.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Bifrost... If used properly, its mass driver could indeed be utilized to launch a direct strike against Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Councilor A', 3: 'According to the report... Gray Raven is conducting reconnaissance in the vicinity?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "We've failed to establish stable communications with Gray Raven so far. This mission report is all we've received from their end.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Councilor B', 3: 'If we attempt a direct strike on Aerospace City from Babylonia...', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Destroying the accelerator track would solve our immediate crisis, but do you really want to burn down the most advanced experimental cold fusion reactor from before the outbreak?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Even though we have the capability to replicate such a reactor, where would we find the manpower and resources to construct it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Councilor A', 3: 'Is it possible to attempt communication with those inside the city?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Asimov receives a distinct alert on his terminal. Gesturing for silence, he opens the device and reviews the incoming data from the monitoring module.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The electromagnetic waves have temporarily ceased. It seems Bifrost's energy accumulation is under intermittent operation, and the reactor is beginning its cooling cycle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'We might be able to establish a brief communication window...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He connects his terminal to the holographic projector and opens the communication channel.'}
{3: "The councilors' discussion quickly subsides as everyone's attention returns to the hologram at the center of the hall."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory944.jpg'}
{3: 'While you rest, you make another attempt to contact Babylonia.'}

{3: 'Your terminal is still picking up fragments of conversation, but they are just communications between the remaining resistance forces in the city and the sterile binary broadcasts from the mechanoids.'}
{3: 'As for the colonial ship in orbit, Babylonia seems to be completely cut off by the electromagnetic interference field.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...Commandant! The signal seems to be coming back!', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Babylon... Do you copy?'}
{3: "The final words suddenly cut through with perfect clarity—a young man's voice you know all too well."}
{2: 'Is that you, Asimov?', 3: '125', 4: 'This is the Gray Raven Commandant.', 5: '128'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Finally. The Parliament is holding an emergency session. Please report the situation at Aerospace City.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'This is the Babylonia Parliament. We are currently holding an emergency session. Please report the situation at Aerospace City.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'Bifrost has begun charging, and Babylonia has recognized the gravity of the situation. After establishing a stable connection on the secured channel, you briefly describe your encounters since you landed.'}
{2: '...That concludes everything. Although the resistance forces are currently contained, new conflicts can erupt at any moment.', 3: '133'}
{3: 'Asimov does not respond immediately. The channel is filled with what sounds like discussions in the Parliament, though their words are completely indiscernible.'}
{3: 'While they need time to process this information, you also urgently require assistance.'}
{3: "After a brief commotion, Asimov's voice comes through from the other end."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "The military will attempt to dispatch a Task Force squad to your location. We're currently confirming with the surrounding forces.", 4: '1'}
{2: "We've formed a temporary alliance with Yulia's refugees. I'll continue negotiations with the resistance forces and hostile mechanoids to buy us time.", 3: '138'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Is there something else?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'An awakened mechanoid named Hanying is working with me. Her target is Veronica.', 3: '141', 4: "Our allies include Hanying, an awakened machine. She's here to track down Veronica.", 5: '142'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Hanying? The Kowloong mechanoid that Gray Raven encountered during the Tabula Akasha incident?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'That name is familiar... You mentioned her in your report after the Tabula Akasha battle.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Stay alert and be careful—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your communication is once again disrupted by electromagnetic interference.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Without a mechanoid as a guide, it will take the reinforcement some time to clear the minefield even if they take our route.', 4: '1'}
{2: "We'll buy as much time as we can.", 3: '152', 4: "We'll do our best.", 5: '152'}
{3: 'You must find a balance in this chaos that minimizes the casualties before it is too late.'}
{3: 'As Dimitri said, this ravaged city cannot endure another all-out war.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory256.png'}
{1: 'Science Council'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Long', 3: "Bifrost... I've only heard stories about it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Long', 3: 'The ingenuity of humanity during the Golden Age is truly remarkable.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Such romantic and imaginative ideas could only have been transformed into magnificent structures during that era.'}
{2: 'Long', 3: "Come to think of it, that was humanity's last hope, wasn't it?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov remains silent as he gazes at Earth through the porthole.'}
{3: 'Awakened machines keep entering Aerospace City... Perhaps that is more alarming than the hastily activated Bifrost.'}
{3: 'What kind of upheaval is taking place on the surface...'}
{3: 'At some point in time, everything seems to have been spiraling toward an uncontrollable abyss.'}
